description: Resource Type definition for AWS::DevOpsAgent::Association defining how the AgentSpace interacts with external services like GitHub, Slack, AWS accounts, and others.

AssociationId.description: The unique identifier of the association
AssociationId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of the association

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceId.description: The identifier for the associated service. For SourceAws and Aws configurations, this must be 'aws'. For all other service types, this is a UUID generated from the RegisterService command
ServiceId.markdownDescription:
